ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice, but some singing steel has stat bonuses too.  The greaves, for example, have +8 to four stats ... From: Sylly Songsynger  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Nice, but some singing steel has stat bonuses too. The greaves, for
example, have +8 to four stats
----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 2:44 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Armor


> I made a table to compare the AC of various bard armor pieces from banded
thru singing steel.
>
> http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/Sylly/bardarmor.htm
>
> Singing Steel from what we have seen adds greatly to AC. I took the
liberty of guess-timating what the unfound pieces are gonna be and the total
is rather awesome. Given the uber-ness of the uber-mobs: Trakanon, whoever
awaits in Veeshan's, etc. Even at level 60 we will all be needing some of
this uber-armor and some uber weps. Now if we had some uber-instruments to
go with the armor...
>
> Sylly
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
